Megatron walks by the storage area, on the way to the infermarey, he
notices that Condor is Missing, and that Decapitron has just arrived. He
opens his comm-link, and ties it into the base. "Who ever has Condor, bring
her down to the storage room, we need him right now." he finishes, then
continues walking.



Autofire's gun reveals the Quintesson. "Put down your hostilities
Decepticon, I am not your enemy." He then moves forward. His face whirls
and changes, and starts to spout some more words, "Probability of you
scheming is around 56%, with your reaction inside your own base"  he says,
announcing the fact.
